DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to support the suspected expectation that Contrast enhanced Ultrasound (CUS) detects all endoleaks that have been detected by Computed Tomography (CT), and also find a number of leaks missed by CT. The investigators' primary goal is to detect no difference between CT and CUS and provide evidence that CUS is a possible alternative to CT.
DOC.brief_title: Contrast Ultrasound in the Surveillance of Endovascular Abdominal Aortic Aneurysm Repair
DOC.criteria: All patients who underwent EVAR at The Ottawa Hospital and currently under postEVAR surveillance at The Ottawa Hospital. Unable to consent for injection of contrast Unable to acquire IV access Righttoleft, bidirectional, or transient righttoleft cardiac shunts Severe pulmonary disease Previous hypersensitivity to DEFINITYÂ® or its components Unable to be followed as a outpatient by the Vascular Diagnostic Center
